articles.author: Damon Wise
articles.title: ‘Chicken Run: Dawn Of The Nugget’ Review: Refreshing Aardman Sequel Comes With A Playful ‘Mission: Impossible’ Vibe – London Film Festival - Deadline
articles.description: By any metric, 23 years is a long time to wait for a sequel to Chicken Run, even when you factor in the fiendishly slow gestation of Aardman Animations’ meticulous stop-motion process. Surprisingly…
